commit.message: NIFI-7954 Wrapping HBase_*_ClientService calls in getUgi().doAs() and taking care of TGT renewal.

nodes.bodyText:
In my opinion passing in a UserGroupProvider instance instead of the ugiProvider would make no difference from the functionality point of view but it'd simplify the usage/improve the readability.
As for the second parameter I'm not fully sure why we need the CallableThrowingException class. For me simple Callable seems to be ok too, even though it doesn't specify its exception type, but I don't see the need for that.
minor nit: () -> function.call() could be replaced with method reference, i.e. function::call
This can be removed now that it is not used right?
